divs: Sighting DetailsI was in my front yard talking to my cousin and I noticed that it was really hot so I looked up toward the sun and said man it's hot when I noticed an neon lite or maybe sun glare when I notice an egg shape object floating slow down the middle of the street and it changed direction and started coming over my house so I grabbed my iPhone 4S and started filming I didn't know what to think all I know is that it was not an airplane you see for your self tell me what you think
trends: There have been 47 other sightings in Cleveland
There were no other sightings in Cleveland on or around August 25th 2012
Object Shape: Bullet, Missile, Cigar, Cross, Cylinder, Diamond, Disc, Egg, Oval, Saturn-like, Star-like, Teardrop
Summary: About 3:00pm central time I was in the front yard and it was hot and something told me to look up and there it was floating in the sky and it was bright and I took pictures of the event tell me what you think
